descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#33FFFF]Sky[/color]Indent[/size] has been released to the public on Creation Kit Wiki page under the Notepad++ section since Feb 2012, I just now decided to post it here on the Nexus

It is a source code beautifier for Papyrus, see the Image files for results, It will require you to have LUA installed to run the script

Command Line switches
[color=#FF33FF]-[/color][size=4][b]s[color=#00ff00][number][/color][/b][/size] Space indent, default is tabular indentation (example: -s4)
[color=#FF33FF]-[/color][size=4][b]b[/b][/size] Backup file, outputs [filename].backup
author: PROXiCiDE
